commitMessage:
@@@[SPARK-11462][STREAMING] Add JavaStreamingListener

Currently.  StreamingListener is not Java friendly because it exposes some Scala collections to Java users directly.  such as Option.  Map.

This PR added a Java version of StreamingListener and a bunch of Java friendly classes for Java users.

Author: zsxwing <zsxwing@gmail.com>
Author: Shixiong Zhu <shixiong@databricks.com>

Closes #9420 from zsxwing/java-streaming-listener.

@@@[SPARK-11333][STREAMING] Add executorId to ReceiverInfo and display it in UI Expose executorId to `ReceiverInfo` and UI since it's helpful when there are multiple executors running in the same host. Screenshot: Author: Shixiong Zhu Author: zsxwing Closes #9418 from zsxwing/SPARK-11333.
